product_name: L'OrealTrue Match Nude Hyaluronic Tinted Serum
summary: SummaryHighlightsVeganGive BackL'Oreal's True Match Nude Hyaluronic Tinted Serum contains 1% Hyaluronic acid and instantly brightens, evens, and hydrates skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsHyaluronic acid gives skin a hydrated feel & smooths overtimeInstantly skin looks brighter, even & feels hydratedLuminous mineral pigments brighten complexionKey Ingredients1% Hyaluronic acidItem 2582143How To UseShake well before using. Apply a few drops directly to your face. Use fingers to blend starting at the center and working your way outwards. Can be worn alone or layered with other makeup/skincare products.For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact get medical help or contact a poison control center right away.Ingredients2-3 Light: Aqua/Water/Eau, Isododecane, Dimethicone, Alcohol Denat., Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Butylene Glycol, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Perlite, Sodium Hyaluronate, Nylon-12, Isopropyl Lauroyl Sarcosinate, Diisopropyl Sebacate, Disteardimonium, Hectorite, Hdi/Trimethylol Hexyllactone, Crosspolymer, Bis-Peg/Ppg-14/14 Dimethicone, Magnesium Sulfate Synthetic, Fluorphlogopite, Ethylhexyl Hydroxystearate, Phenoxyethanol, Cellulose, Dipentaerythrityl, Tetrahydroxystearate/Tetraisostearate, Silica, Silylate, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Calcium, Aluminum Borosilicate, Tocopherol, Moroccan Lava Clay, Glycerin, Empetrum Nigrum Fruit Juice, Aluminum Hydroxide, Silica, Potassium Sorbate. May Contain/Peut Contenir (+/-): Ci 77491, Ci 77492, Ci 77499/Iron Oxides Ci 77891/Titanium Dioxide Ci 77163/Bismuth Oxychloride. Fil Code B269994/1.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsShipping Restrictions : This item cannot be shipped via air.
how_to_use: Shake well before using. Apply a few drops directly to your face. Use fingers to blend starting at the center and working your way outwards. Can be worn alone or layered with other makeup/skincare products.For external use only. Do not use on damaged or broken skin. When using this product keep out of eyes. Rinse with water to remove. Stop use and ask a doctor if rash occurs. Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact get medical help or contact a poison control center right away.

reviews.headline: nice
reviews.comments: bro good one

reviews.headline: Go-to easy to use everyday tint
reviews.comments: So many skin tints are out in the market but this is hands down the easiest to use, hydrating without being too glowy or shiny and perfect amount of coverage for me. I use the shade 5-6 Medium Tan and it works well in the summer (have to use one shade lighter in the winter). Since it's a skin tint, the staying power by itself is not amazing but if I set it with powder and spray my face with setting spray, it lasts all day without touch ups.

reviews.headline: Amazing product! Bad packaging
reviews.comments: Love this formula and the shade match. Only issue is the awful packaging, very messy with the dropper. Love it so much I'll buy my own pump.

reviews.headline: My new favorite foundation
reviews.comments: This gives good coverage, lightweight and my skin looks fantastic. It's so natural and I struggled finding something that didn't make me look too oily.  However my skin still looks hydrated.  The only downfall is the dropper -  that doesn't seem to be the best way to apply.  I just put some on a foundation brush and don't use the dropper.

reviews.headline: my favorite < 3
reviews.comments: I've never found a truer match than the light-medium shade of this tint. This product can be built up to medium coverage if needed. The only issue is the dropper. Overtime, it builds product around the itself resulting in messy application. I just use a brush to apply instead to avoid over using product.

reviews.headline: Not For Me
reviews.comments: I have worn L'Oreal foundations for years and loved them.  But as I age, I cannot seem to find a formula that works for my skin.  The good:  a broad choice of colors.  The price point is not bad for the amount of product you get.  The bad:  this formula is more watery than most of their foundations, and it settled into fine lines and into pores.  The finish became splotchy after several hours.  The applicator dropper is awful to use.  Very messy.   I returned it.

reviews.headline: Amazing for "no makeup" makeup days
reviews.comments: Love this for days I don't want to wear a full face/more coverage. Lightly evens out skin tone and is super hydrating and glowy. Like a super light cc cream.

reviews.headline: Not for Oily Skin
reviews.comments: Wanted to like this due to the HA but it just makes your face orange and oily....

reviews.headline: Matte finish?
reviews.comments: I have very dry, acne prone skin. I wanted to try this as it seemed like a nice, light-weight, hydrating product. This item was very oily and some how also mattifying. I also prepped my skin well and used a hydrating toner and primer. I will be returning this product.

reviews.headline: Loved it more than I thought I would
reviews.comments: Wow! I ended up loving this more than I thought I would. It is absolutely beautiful, evens out your skin tone perfectly. It is a tint so don't expect anything full coverage, but is it buildable so you can get decent coverage out of it. It makes your skin look plump and even. It is not too luminous and lasts a long time with powder. I use a light coverage of Fenty invisimatte powder with setting spray and it is transfer proof. I wear it alone or with a full face. I love it. The only thing is the packaging. The dropper is a huge mess, I bought a pump for it online and now it is the most perfect tint/foundation that I own.

reviews.headline: 35+ years old? This is THE ONE
reviews.comments: After using this tinted serum for about a week now, I can confidently say that this is the absolute best option for those of us with fine lines! It doesn't dramatically sink into my under eye lines, it doesn't crease around my smile lines, it stays on all day regardless of what you're doing, and it blends in with my skin tone beautifully while still covering up any discoloration. The best part, you don't need setting powder to make it last all day. In fact, I found that setting powder (pressed and loose) made it look worse. It's perfect just the way it is and I hope L'oreal never stops making it.

reviews.headline: Best Foundation!
reviews.comments: I love this foundation so much! as someone with really sensitive skin this didn't affect me at all! I recommend this to anyone with sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: shade range…
reviews.comments: Got the lightest shade and still wasnt light enough, made me look orange not a good range of shades and not inclusive. ☹️

reviews.headline: Really nice skin tint product
reviews.comments: Love the way this looks on my skin for a light makeup day. I have post acne redness, and while this helped provide evenness to my complexion, it is not a ton of coverage. However it wears well and is very light weight on the skin.

reviews.headline: Amazing amazing!
reviews.comments: I usually never come on platforms and write reviews but I would most definitely say Loreal's foundations never disappoints. The minute I tried this for the first time. It was my skin color in a bottle and it aas the most lightweight and comfortabke foundation I have EVER used and I have used armani, estee lauder, nars, charlotte tilbury, laura mercier, etc. This isn't tinited definitely has the amazing coverage of a foundation. The minute I rubbed it on my fave it was like every imperfection was covered, full coverage, but soooo lightweight felt like I had nothing on. I had it on for about 10 hours and it looked amazing at the end kf the day. I got two compliments in one day asking what foundation I was wearing. I love it and I already know I'm going to continje purchasing this for a long time. Amazing.

reviews.headline: GP
reviews.comments: bad experinece

reviews.headline: This is a must have!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product! It has a dropper applicator for easy application. It's lightweight, soft and not greasy with overall stunning coverage. And it also has hyaluronic acid for anti-aging. Highly recommend and very reasonably priced.

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: This serum is great! I chose a shade based off the "shade finder" option on the app and thought it looked way too dark in the bottle and before blending BUT when fully applied it practically disappeared on my skin perfectly. It looks like I'm not wearing any makeup but it smoothed my complexion and made my skin look super healthy.  This is my first tinted serum (i usually go for full coverage because of occasional acne) but this is my new go-to for my every day no-makeup look. I also have super oily skin but this has held up all day without turning into an oily mess like the other foundation I used, even over SPF.  The applicator could be a bit better but it doesn't bother me. Very happy with this!

reviews.headline: i like this product
reviews.comments: i like this product

reviews.headline: Pass on it
reviews.comments: First, this is not a dupe for Armani.  This stuff is super shiny and the colors are off.  The dropper is a mess.  I did like the glass bottle.  I would not buy again.

media.headline: Quick and easy addition to my no makeup, makeup routine
L'Oréal True Match Nude Hyaluronic Tinted Serum

faceoff_positive.comments: I have huge pores and very oily skin. I'm 39 years old and noticing my fine lines showing with my usual favorite foundation. Also my foundation always lifts off my face about an hour after wearing it.  I decided that I should try something different. I decided to give this serum a go. At first glance it seemed a little greasy and hard to blend, but after a 20 seconds or so the greasiness fades and the covering starts to kick in. I don't like a shiny face so I did apply a tiny bit of setting powder along with some blush and it looked very natural and matte, but not cakey. The real test was how long would it take to lift off my face due to my excessive oiliness. It's been almost 8 hours and NO sign of lifting or shine! That alone makes it worth it for me!  I wear the lightest color Nude 0.5-2 and it's pretty close to my skin tone. I have a yellow undertone which is difficult to find pale shades in, but this still looks pretty natural on me.  Overall, I'm very pleased with this serum. I dont mind the dropper, because pumps usually put out too much foundation, especially if I want to add a little more coverage to certain spots on my face.
faceoff_positive.headline: Doesn't lift off my oily skin!

faceoff_negative.comments:
Great formulation for a product like this. The color choices are for broad ranges of shades and I'm pleased to say that despite how light and cool I am, the color worked great for me. The product stays on  longer than the foundation balm, especially when set with a spray. I do not like how it performs when set with powder.  I have 2 complaints: 1) the product goes on streaky with a brush and its too thin for a sponge so I put it on with a brush and then go back over with a damp sponge to tap out all the streaks. 2) the packaging is a disaster. Total mess. Fortunately I was able to find a pump online that is compatible with the bottle but the pump should be part of the packaging. 

Feedback for Loreal Product Management: I get why you went with the dropper bottle. It helps the product stand apart visually from other foundations in the Loreal line and it reminds me of a serum bottle. But I suspect most of your customers are using this like a foundation, not a serum. And since the packaging is such a mess you're not likely to get 2nd time purchasers who have lots of other choices. I recommend switching to a pump top or a soft pump tube and make the pump dispense a tiny amount - like when a skincare serum comes with a pump. Maybe we'll need 3-4 pumps of product to cover the face (given how much product stays on the brush or sponge), but at least it won't make such a brutal mess of our sinks/desks/makeup stations at home.
faceoff_negative.headline: Good product, great colors, problematic packaging
